code.displayName: CHIEF COMPLAINT AND REASON FOR VISIT

section.title: Reason for Visit and Chief Complaint

text.content: The Chief Complaint is: staff request eval for recheck on condition. patient has returned from therapy. she is in good spirits this am. she denies chest pain. no sob no abd. pain no current dysuria. she states she has been dizzy at times, in the mornings when she first gets up. today she is seen before breakfast. her bp is 102/67. not dizzy while sitting

tr.td: Last documented on 2024-03-11; 8:07 PM, Brian Hansen NP; Gonzalez, Wang and Mcconnell

paragraph.content: - Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease with Exacerbation
- Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 - Uncomplicated, Controlled By Insulin

The Chief Complaint is: Staff request eval for recheck on condition. patient has returned from therapy. she is in good spirits this am. she denies chest pain. no sob no abd. pain no current dysuria. she states she has been dizzy at times, in the mornings when she first gets up. today she is seen before breakfast. her bp is 102/67. not dizzy while sitting.
Christine HENRICHS is a 76 year old female.

- Allergy list reviewed - Problem list reviewed - Medication reconciliation performed - Medication list reviewed - Medication list reviewed with no changes - Family history reviewed - Surgical history reviewed
- There has been a fall in the past year
- Acetaminophen 325 MG Oral Tablet 2 PO q 6 hrs prn, 0 days, 0 refills
- Albuterol Sulfate 108 (90 Base) MCG/ACT Inhalation Aerosol Powder Breath Activated 2 puffs q 4 hrs prn, 0 days, 0 refills
- AZO Urinary Pain Relief 95 MG Oral Tablet 1 PO q 6 hrs prn, 0 days, 0 refills
- Budesonide-Formoterol Fumarate 160-4.5 MCG/ACT Inhalation Aerosol 2 puffs BID, 0 days, 0 refills
- Fluticasone Furoate 50 MCG/ACT Inhalation Aerosol Powder Breath Activated 1 spray each nostril qdaily routine, 0 days, 0 refills
- hydroCHLOROthiazide 25 MG Oral Tablet once a day 1 PO qdaily, 0 days, 0 refills
- Ipratropium-Albuterol 0.5-2.5 (3) MG/3ML Inhalation Solution USE FOR AEROSOL TREATMENTS VIA NEBULIZER 3ML EVERY 6 HOURS FOR COPD, 30 days, 11 refills
- Lantus 100 UNIT/ML Subcutaneous Solution 20 units SQ bid, 0 days, 0 refills
- metFORMIN HCl 500 MG Oral Tablet 1 PO bid, 0 days, 6 refills
- NovoLIN R 100 UNIT/ML Injection Solution SSi bid, 0 days, 0 refills
- Simvastatin 40 MG Oral Tablet 1 PO qhs, 0 days, 0 refills
- Solifenacin Succinate 5 MG Oral Tablet one po q HS, 0 days, 0 refills
- Valsartan 160 MG Oral Tablet 1 PO qdaily, 0 days, 0 refills
- Vitamin D3 50 MCG (2000 UT) Oral Tablet 1 PO qdaily, 0 days, 6 refills
- Vitamin Deficiency System-B12 1000 MCG/ML Injection Kit 1000 mcg IM qmonthly, 0 days, 0 refills
No recent change in medical history.
Left mastectomy (from old charts, patient apparently forgot to mention this procedure).
Tobacco use: No tobacco use and no cigarette smoking. Not a tobacco non-user and smoking status: Former smoker.
uses rolling walker and or cane for mobility
using adhere pharmacy mail in or locally, walgreens, ooltewah on old lee highway
Systemic: Not feeling poorly (malaise). No fever, no chills, and no recent weight change.
Cardiovascular: No chest pain or discomfort.
Pulmonary: Dyspnea and cough. No wheezing.
Musculoskeletal: Muscle aches and pain localized to one or more joints.
- Alert. - Well developed. - Well nourished. - In no acute distress.
- Abnormal breath sounds/voice sounds diminished bases. - No wheezing was heard.
General/bilateral: - Mobility was limited 1 + edema both legs.
- Oriented to time, place, and person mostly.
- Thin. - Turgor was decreased. - Dry. - General appearance was normal. - Color and pigmentation were normal. - No ulcer was seen on the feet.
- Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with exacerbation
- Follow-Up Visit to Rescreen Blood Pressure within 1 year.
- Pt received screening for fall risk.
- Patient education about a proper diet
1. encourage frequent toileting due to incontinence
2. encouraged fluids, due to low bp
3. may need to adjust medications due to low bp
5. monitor for changes to LOC or behaviors
Smoking status and exposure to secondhand smoke assessed Not current smoker or current exposure to secondhand smoke Current nonsmoker and no current exposure to secondhand smoke.
